name: SuddenShot
description:
Made in 3 hours for the Trijam #193, around the theme "patience". An arcade bullet hell where the bullets can don't fire at you until you least expect it. Will keep you on your toes and put your reaction time to the test.

===--- HOW TO PLAY ---===

WASD to move the white box around. 

Collect yellow boxes to increase your score.

Avoid Red boxes.
